subject: Investing
title: Penny Stocks and Speculative Shares
description: Learn Penny Stocks and Speculative Shares in one minute.

hook.text: A stock at $0.03 per share. If it hits $0.30, you've made 10x your money. What could go wrong?

buildup.text: Penny stocks trade for under $5, often on small exchanges with minimal regulation and disclosure.

discovery.text: Low prices attract gamblers. But low price doesn't mean cheap â€” it often means the company is failing.

twist.text: Pump-and-dump schemes are rampant. Promoters hype a stock, sell at the top, and leave latecomers with losses.

climax.text: SEC research shows most penny stock investors lose money. The lottery odds are actually better.

punchline.text: Penny stocks are cheap for a reason. The price is a warning, not an opportunity.
